H3.text: what colleges did harper lee attend. Huntingdon College

A4.text: Nelle attended the then all-female Huntingdon College in Montgomery for a year.

A5.text: then transferred to the University of Alabama in Tuscaloosa, where she studied law for several years.

A6.text: Harper Lee is listed among the University of Alabama alumni.
